thread.section_title: Luna Bazaar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luna Bazaar | www.lunabazaar.com
thread.title: Luann

author: Luann
title: Luann
text: An old mercury Pottery Barn candlestick was accidentally broken. They no longer carried it - Found the Luna Bazaar and was able to replace the exact candlestick. As a caterer, I use these in numerous tablescapes. Their shipping was quick. No need for customer service as my order was filled in 3 days. Their products are top quality. Will definitely be back. Infact, think i have already sent in another order.
